tpeg_message.summary: A501 Antrim - A501 Glen Road in Hannahstown closed in both directions between the Glenside Road junction and the Suffolk Road junction, because of roadworks.
A29 Londonderry - Temporary lights on A29 Drumcroon Road in both directions in Coleraine from the Killeague Road junction to the Ballylintagh Road junction, because of works on telecom cables.
Antrim - Derriaghy Road in Derriaghy closed in both directions from the Milltown Road junction to the A513 junction, because of roadworks.
Down - Barr Hall Road in Portaferry closed in both directions from the Shore Road junction to the Bar Hall Bay junction, because of water main work.
B183 Antrim - One lane closed and temporary lights on B183 Moneynick Road eastbound in Creggan-Cranfield from the Ballynafey Road junction to the Derryhollagh Lane junction, because of roadworks.
Antrim - Ballyduff Road in Newtownabbey closed in both directions from the Fairview Road junction to the Carnmoney Road junction, because of resurfacing work.
